headline: Cell and Gene Therapy Third-Party Logistics Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Cencora, Cardinal Health, McKesson, EVERSANA, Knipper Health, Arvato, DHL, and Kuehne+Nagel
summary: The Global Cell and Gene Therapy Third-Party Logistics Market is projected to surge to US$ 20.98 billion by 2033, up from US$ 8.66 billion in 2024, growing at a CAGR of 10.33%. Key growth drivers include technological advancements in cold chain logistics, an increase in clinical studies, and the rise of personalized medicine.
